headline: Tracking Chase Coleman's Tiger Global Portfolio - Q2 2025 Update
summary: Tiger Global's 13F portfolio surged to $34.08B, driven by concentrated bets in tech giants like Meta, Microsoft, Amazon, Alphabet, and Nvidia. Read the full analysis now.

headline: Zaelab Appoints Bob Schwartz as Vice Chairman while Accelerating Enterprise Modernization Strategy
summary: Zaelab, the leading provider of business-to-business ("B2B") digital transformation solutions, today announced the appointment of Bob Schwartz to its Board of Directors as Vice Chairman. Schwartz brings experience building enterprise technology companies that have reshaped the market and will help guide Zaelab's next phase of growth.

headline: UGG Selects Aria Systems, ServiceNow, and Tenon to Power Next Generation BSS
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, September 04, 2025--Aria Systems, the leader in AI-powered billing automation, today announced that Unsere Grüne Glasfaser (UGG) has selected Aria Billing Cloud, Tenon, and ServiceNow CRM for their integrated SaaS-based BSS suite. The solution combines Aria’s advanced billing automation with ServiceNow CRM to streamline enterprise customer revenue and service operations. headline: ServiceNow (NOW): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q2 Earnings?
summary: ServiceNow has been treading water for the past six months, recording a small return of 1% while holding steady at $915. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 11.6% gain during that period.

headline: Salesforce Remains A Buy As Market Digests Its Maturity
summary: Salesforce is shifting to sustainable profit growth and rising margins. Valuation is reasonable, even cheap. Learn if CRM stock is still a smart buy for investors.
